name: Hot Crucible
description:
Welcome to our Magical Factory.

You are a new Hire in our Company and are assigned to mixing Potions.
You just have to bring the Water to a boil, chuck in the required magic powders,
and call the Collector down.
At least it would have been that easy, if the janitors hadn't thrown some of our powders with all our current recipes into the furnace.
We have lost all Control over that thing and the heat just keeps rising in all our crucibles. 
But no worries, just keep a look out for your trusty Thermostat and make sure the Crucible stays topped up with water. As for the recipes? Just chuck in whatever you can find, and get the color similar enough to our bottled Samples.

[Instructions]

Mouse Only

-Hold Red Button to fill up Water.

-Click Lever to call Collector.

-Switch between Ingredients and Commission with the Buttons at the sides.

-Click the Trays with powder to add Ingredients to the Cauldron.

-Press Escape to Quit.

[Rules]

-Quality decreases at high Heat.

-Ingredients and new Water chill the Liquid.

-Water must be boiling for Ingredients to be incorporated.

-The more Ingredients in the Pot the more points.
